name: Sheepland
description:
It is a demo version of Sheepland - game, where you have to eat different fruits and gain score for it. The problem are the wolf, that tries to catch you, and some environment details that can hurt your sheep. Only thing that can help you is shitty, which slow the wolf down for a few seconds. 

Since it's my first game I will be very thankful for critics and good words. Have a good fun and cheers!
